channel.title: Send selection bug
channel.description:
#### What happened? I hit send selection and it sent the random default right side listing of numbers (i.e 1 king 2 3 ect) even though I already deleted that from my logs. Also in the game before I only got send selection to do my n1 on the left side nothing after that
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? It was supposed to send my updated n1 and my claim which was on the left side of the log book.
#### Steps to reproduce: Not sure if I can as it is bug with the send logs feature so not sure if it is happens all the time or not
#### Comments: games were around 12:39 central time. Also I tried send selection in death chat and it still wanted to send the same thing

item.title: Send selection bug
item.dc:creator: kylundstrom92
item.description:
What happened?

I hit send selection and it sent the random default right side listing of numbers (i.e 1 king 2 3 ect) even though I already deleted that from my logs. Also in the game before I only got send selection to do my n1 on the left side nothing after that

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

It was supposed to send my updated n1 and my claim which was on the left side of the log book.

Steps to reproduce:

Not sure if I can as it is bug with the send logs feature so not sure if it is happens all the time or not

Comments:

games were around 12:39 central time. Also I tried send selection in death chat and it still wanted to send the same thing

Read full topic
